languages.text:
Проекты — основа развития колоний. Для их выполнения вам понадобятся ресурсы, которые можно получить при исследовании планет и космических аномалий.
Выполнение проектов занимает некоторое время. Продолжайте путешествовать по {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простору{/g} — когда проект будет выполнен, вы увидите уведомление на экране и сможете забрать награду.

Projects are the backbone of colony development. Completing them requires resources that can be obtained by exploring planets and cosmic anomalies.
Completing a project takes time. While you continue your travels throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, you will receive a notification on the screen when a project is finished, informing you that the reward can now be claimed.
languages.original_text:
Проекты — основа развития колоний. Для их выполнения вам понадобятся ресурсы, которые можно получить при исследовании планет и космических аномалий.
Выполнение проектов занимает некоторое время. Продолжайте путешествовать по {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простору{/g} — когда проект будет выполнен, вы увидите уведомление на экране и сможете забрать награду.

traits.locale_text:
Projects are the backbone of colony development. Completing them requires resources that can be obtained by exploring planets and cosmic anomalies.
Completing a project takes time. You can continue your travels in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and when the project is finished, you will receive a notification on the screen informing you that the reward can now be claimed by returning to the colony.

Projects are the backbone of colony development. Completing them requires resources that can be obtained by exploring planets and cosmic anomalies.
Completing a project takes time. You can continue your travels in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and when the project is finished, you will receive a notification on the screen informing you that the reward can now be claimed by returning to the colony.

Projects are the backbone of colony development. Completing them requires resources that can be obtained by exploring planets and cosmic anomalies.
Completing a project takes time. While you continue your travels throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, you will receive a notification on the screen when a project is finished, informing you that the reward can now be claimed by returning to the colony.

Projects are the backbone of colony development. Completing them requires resources that can be obtained by exploring planets and cosmic anomalies.
Completing a project takes time. While you continue your travels throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, you will receive a notification on the screen when a project is finished, informing you that the reward can now be claimed.

Projects are the backbone of colony development. Completing them requires resources that can be obtained by exploring planets and cosmic anomalies.
Completing a project takes time. While you continue your travels throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, you will receive a notification on the screen when a project is finished, informing you that the reward can now be claimed.

languages.text:
Los proyectos son la espina dorsal del desarrollo de las colonias. Para completarlos necesitarás recursos que puedes obtener explorando planetas y anomalías cósmicas.
Para completar un proyecto también hace falta tiempo. Mientras recorres la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, recibirás una notificación en pantalla informándote de que un proyecto ha terminado y puedes recibir tu recompensa.
languages.original_text:
Projects are the backbone of colony development. Completing them requires resources that can be obtained by exploring planets and cosmic anomalies.
Completing a project takes time. While you continue your travels throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, you will receive a notification on the screen when a project is finished, informing you that the reward can now be claimed.

traits.locale_text:
Los proyectos son la espina dorsal del desarrollo de las colonias. Para completarlos necesitarás recursos que puedes obtener explorando planetas y anomalías cósmicas.
Para completar un proyecto también hace falta tiempo. Mientras recorres la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, recibirás una notificación en pantalla informándote de que un proyecto ha terminado y puedes recibir tu recompensa si vuelves a la colonia.

languages.text:
プロジェクトはコロニー開発のバックボーンである。完了するには、惑星や宇宙の異常を探索することで得られる資源が必要だ。
プロジェクトの完了には時間がかかる。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}を旅している間は、プロジェクトが終了すると画面に通知が表示され、コロニーで報酬を受け取れると表示される。
languages.original_text:
Projects are the backbone of colony development. Completing them requires resources that can be obtained by exploring planets and cosmic anomalies.
Completing a project takes time. While you continue your travels throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, you will receive a notification on the screen when a project is finished, informing you that the reward can now be claimed.

traits.locale_text:
プロジェクトはコロニー開発のバックボーンである。完了するには、惑星や宇宙の異常を探索することで得られる資源が必要だ。
プロジェクトの完了には時間がかかる。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}を旅する間は、プロジェクトが終了すると画面に通知が表示され、コロニーに戻ると報酬を受け取ることができる。

languages.text:
项目是殖民地发展的重要支柱。完成项目需要资源，这些资源可以通过探索行星和宇宙异象获得。
完成项目需要花费时间。当您在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}旅行时，所有完成的项目都会显示在屏幕上，您可以直接领取奖励。
languages.original_text:
Projects are the backbone of colony development. Completing them requires resources that can be obtained by exploring planets and cosmic anomalies.
Completing a project takes time. While you continue your travels throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, you will receive a notification on the screen when a project is finished, informing you that the reward can now be claimed.

traits.locale_text:
项目是殖民地发展的重要支柱。完成项目需要资源，这些资源可以通过探索行星和宇宙异象获得。
完成项目需要花费时间。当您在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}旅行时，所有完成的项目都会显示在屏幕上，您可以直接领取奖励。

languages.text:
Projekte sind das Rückgrat der Kolonie-Entwicklung. Um sie abzuschließen, brauchst du Ressourcen, die du durch die Erkundung von Planeten und kosmischen Anomalien erhalten kannst.
Die Fertigstellung eines Projekts braucht Zeit. Während du deine Reisen durch die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} fortsetzt, erhältst du eine Benachrichtigung auf dem Bildschirm, wenn ein Projekt abgeschlossen ist, die dich darüber informiert, dass du die Belohnung nun einfordern kannst.
languages.original_text:
Projects are the backbone of colony development. Completing them requires resources that can be obtained by exploring planets and cosmic anomalies.
Completing a project takes time. While you continue your travels throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, you will receive a notification on the screen when a project is finished, informing you that the reward can now be claimed.

traits.locale_text:
Projekte sind das Rückgrat der Kolonie-Entwicklung. Um sie abzuschließen, brauchst du Ressourcen, die du durch die Erkundung von Planeten und kosmischen Anomalien erhalten kannst.
Die Fertigstellung eines Projekts braucht Zeit. Während du deine Reisen durch die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} fortsetzt, erhältst du eine Benachrichtigung auf dem Bildschirm, wenn ein Projekt abgeschlossen ist, die dich darüber informiert, dass du die Belohnung nun einfordern kannst, indem du zur Kolonie zurückkehrst.

languages.text:
Les projets sont l'épine dorsale du développement des colonies. Leur réalisation nécessite des ressources accessibles en explorant des planètes et des anomalies cosmiques.
L'aboutissement d'un projet prend du temps. Au cours de vos voyages dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, vous recevrez une notification à l'écran lorsqu'un projet est terminé, vous informant que la récompense peut être récupérée.
languages.original_text:
Projects are the backbone of colony development. Completing them requires resources that can be obtained by exploring planets and cosmic anomalies.
Completing a project takes time. While you continue your travels throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, you will receive a notification on the screen when a project is finished, informing you that the reward can now be claimed.

traits.locale_text:
Les projets sont l'épine dorsale du développement des colonies. Leur réalisation nécessite des ressources accessibles en explorant des planètes et des anomalies cosmiques.
L'aboutissement d'un projet prend du temps. Au cours de vos voyages dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, vous recevrez une notification à l'écran lorsqu'un projet sera terminé, vous informant que la récompense peut être réclamée en retournant à la colonie.

languages.text:
Projeler, koloni gelişiminin bel kemiğidir. Onları tamamlayabilmek için gezegenleri ve kozmik anomalileri keşfedip araştırarak kaynak elde etmek gerekir.
Projelerin tamamlanması zaman alır. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'ndeki seyahatlerin esnasında bir proje tamamlandığında, ekranda bir bildirim belirerek ona ilişkin ödülü alabileceğin konusunda seni bilgilendirir.
languages.original_text:
Projects are the backbone of colony development. Completing them requires resources that can be obtained by exploring planets and cosmic anomalies.
Completing a project takes time. While you continue your travels throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, you will receive a notification on the screen when a project is finished, informing you that the reward can now be claimed.
